title: << furnished creekside cabin, 4mi from downtown
posting_body: This shady furnished creekside cabin is a cozy quiet getaway in the woods... that's also just a few miles from all the delights of central Austin!
Less than 4 miles from downtown in the quaint, walkable Hyde Park neighborhood, the cabin is tucked away behind my house, exclusively yours to use with a welcoming xeriscaped firepit patio in front.
Waller Creek burbles by, a stone's throw away.
Fully furnished with linens, towels, the usual kitchen appliances, queen bed, a smart TV, Alexa Dot smart speaker, Google Fiber, Keurig coffeemaker, and a pullout couch that sleeps two.
Walking distance from shopping, dining, groceries, bars, and coffee shops.
1.7 miles from the University of Texas at Austin.
Or just amble and sample the local treats?
The cabin's a great place to start.
1.9 miles from St. David's Medical Center on 32nd, 1.6 miles from Ascension Seton Medical on 38th, and 2.1 miles from Dell Children's.
